abstract: Manosha Karunatilaka, a former employee of Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing, admitted participating in an insider trading scheme tied to Primary Global Research, an expert network firm.
snippet: Manosha Karunatilaka, a former employee of Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing, admitted participating in an insider trading scheme tied to Primary Global Research, an expert network firm.
lead_paragraph: Another defendant pleaded guilty on Wednesday in the government’s wide-ranging investigation into insider trading has pleaded guilty — in the same federal courthouse in Manhattan where a jury convicted the hedge fund billionaire Raj Rajaratnam of fraud and conspiracy.

headline.main: Another Insider Trading Defendant Pleads Guilty
